EmailTemplate.description: Sends a letter to the customer when you need to schedule an upgrade with Engineering.
EmailTemplate.name: TE Upgrade Letter
EmailTemplate.subject: Ticket {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
The {!Account.Name}'s Total Enforcement <production or training> system is scheduled for an upgrade on <Date and Time>. Please follow these steps for the upgrade to occur as smoothly as possible.
- Ensure all users exit the TE application prior to <Date and Time> - Send a confirmation email, reply all to this group, that users have exited TE when that occurs - Upon receipt of an email of the completion of the update, you can resume the use of TE and log back into the software
Sincere Regards,
Management Zuercher TE Technical Support
